name: Halloween Sprint
description:
This is the first game ever made by TheMonkMan aka LazukoAnimates. It was made for a few Game Jams.

You are a bat. The aim of the game is to collect as many toffee apples (candies) as you can, avoid the obstacles and Halloween monsters to get to the next level. The highest speed I have got to is 190 so far with 199 candies, so see if you can beat that!

Each time you complete a level, the music, look and speed gets more intense.

Remember to try out the retro pixelated option.

Enjoy!!! :)

Note: I ran into a bit of trouble packaging this up and so had to put instructions on using the menu with a keyboard as the mouse clicks are not working for some reason. You can cycle through the buttons  by pressing tab to go down (shift tab to go up). Press space/enter to select a button.
